txt.en: 'Midsummer is a joyous festival honouring the bonds of friendship, family, and marriage. All across Middle-earth, the Free Peoples celebrate through dance, song, artisanry, and rites of old!\n\n'If you wish to join in the festivities here in Duillond, you need look no further. However, if you happen to pass near the docks of Celondim, you might find Gairil hard at work.'
Where can I join in Midsummer festivities?
